rationale: The agent's diff is functionally identical to the ground truth. Both add the import for SwedishLightStemFilter and change the return statement on line 155 from SpanishLightStemFilter to SwedishLightStemFilter. The only difference is the placement of the import statement: the agent placed it after RussianLightStemFilter (line 45) while ground truth placed it after SnowballFilter (line 45 in their version). Both placements are valid and follow alphabetical ordering conventions. The fix correctly addresses the bug where light_swedish/lightSwedish configurations were incorrectly returning the Spanish stemmer instead of the Swedish one. No unsolicited documentation was added.
